thread.title: customer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by customer

author: customer
title: customer
text: Love this coat. After comparing prices on the internet this was the best. I am a size 12-14 and ordered a 14, it fits lovely with room for layers as well. Ordered on a Tuesday evening and it arrived on Thursday.
